Title: Penny for Your Thoughts
Plot: Allison encounters a psychopathic doctor who raped and murdered numerous teenage girls years ago. After learning that an evil soul has been possessing people, she sets forth to stop it before a new victim is found. Meanwhile, Ariel's math teacher accuses her of cheating and Joe steps up to her defense.
GuestStars: Cas Anvar, Andy Milder, Michele Harrell, Brent Jennings, Roz Witt, Sumalee Montano, Mark A. Sheppard, Lenora May, Robert Joy, Kay Panabaker
